Instruction: Slice the baguette into 1/2-inch thick slices.
Arrange the baguette slices on a baking sheet and toast them in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes, or until lightly golden.
While the baguette slices are toasting, thinly slice the pears.
Spread goat cheese over each toasted baguette slice.
Top each crostini with a few slices of pear.
Drizzle honey over the pear slices.
Sprinkle chopped walnuts and fresh thyme leaves over the crostini.
Serve the pear and goat cheese crostini immediately as a tasty side dish or appetizer.
